pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimally Robust Estimation // R infrastructure for optimally robust estimation in general smoothly parameterized models using S4 classes and methods as described Kohl, M., Ruckdeschel, P., and Rieder, H. (2010), doi:10.1007/s10260-010-0133-0, and in Rieder, H., Kohl, M., and Ruckdeschel, P. (2008), doi:10.1007/s10260-007-0047-7.
